translations: n.（阿）高山；山（时常作阿拉伯地方名字用）

phrs.translation: 高山, 山, 杰贝阿里港
杰贝阿里, 阿里山, 阿里港, 杰贝阿里港
阿里自由区, 杰贝阿里自由区, 杰拜勒
棕榈岛, 阿里山棕榈岛, 贝阿里岛, 吉贝阿里棕榈岛

sentences.sentence: We also went to several smaller towns on the Jebel Akhdar mountains.
sentences.translation: 我们还去了杰贝尔。阿卡达山上的其它几个小村镇。

sentences.sentence: The Jebel Ali port in Dubai boasts of being the largest man-made harbour in the world.
sentences.translation: 迪拜的杰贝阿里港自诩为世上最大的人工港。

sentences.sentence: Science/AAASAt Jebel Faya, the researchers uncovered three caches of mostly broken, unfinished stone tools.
sentences.translation: 在杰贝尔-法亚，研究人员发现了三处大部分破坏了的和未完成的石器。
